page.title: 18CONTINUED
page.content: MEN GO TO WORK.MOST PEOPLE DO THERE FOOD SHOPPING AT SAINBURYS IN WEST WICKHAM.I DONT THINK THEY HAVE HAD AND BURGALARIES BECAUSE IF THEY HAD THEY WOULD HAVE HAD MORE BURGLAR ALARMS.IT SEEMS A VERY MIDDLE CLASS AREA,THE HOUSES ARE QUITE LARGE BUT THE MOST ROOMS A HOUSE HAS GOT ARE ONLY ELEVEN.THE FAMILIES IN THE AREA ARE ONLY SMALL ONES WITH THE MOST BEING A FIVE PERSON FAMILY.OVER HALF HAVE DOUBLE GLAZING BUT THIRTY FIVE HAVE CENTRAL HEATING AND THIRTY FOUR OF THOSE ALL HAVE GAS.THE FAVOURITE DAILY AND SUNDAY PAPERS WERE THE EXPRESS AND MAIL.THE PEOPLE DONT SEEM TO HAVE MANY LUXURIOUS THINGS LIKE A VIDEO AND COMPUTER AND THEY DONT SEEM TO BE VERY RELIGOUS WITH ONLY TWELVE OUT OF FIFTY PEOPLE GOING TO CHURCH REGULARY.WHEN PEOPLE GO OUT THEY SEEM TO PREFER ENGLISH RESTAURANTS TO FOREIGN ONES.
